abstract: Europe’s sovereign debt crisis threatened to spill over into the broader economy as figures showed that growth in the euro zone fell to its lowest rate in two years.
snippet: Europe’s sovereign debt crisis threatened to spill over into the broader economy as figures showed that growth in the euro zone fell to its lowest rate in two years.
lead_paragraph: FRANKFURT — Europe’s sovereign debt crisis threatened to spill over into the broader economy after official figures released Tuesday showed that growth in the euro zone fell to its lowest rate in two years. Germany — the Continent’s powerhouse — slowed almost to a standstill.

headline.main: Europe’s Debt Crisis Weakens Quarterly Growth
headline.print_headline: Europe’s Debt Crisis Weakens Quarterly Growth
